byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Information Ministry warns pub against run on banks despite instructions from New Brit Broadcasting Co, German shortwave station purporting to operate in Brit
snippet: LONDON, July 1--A new anti-invasion defense zone, varying between five and twenty miles in depth, is now being completed along the south and east coasts of England....

headline.main: ZONE OF DEFENSE BUILT IN ENGLAND; South and East Coasts Being Strongly Fortified to Meet Nazi Invasion TERRAIN WILL BE HELPFUL German Motor Units Will Not Find Long Straight Roads, as They Did in France

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 1--A new anti-invasion defense zone, varying between five and twenty miles in depth, is now being completed along the south and east coasts of England.
